text:
Charles, Knight Vandenhove (3 July 1927, Teuven – 22 January 2019, Liège) was a Belgian architect. His company "Charles Vandenhove et associés" is based in Liège, Belgium. He was known for his work in Belgium, the Netherlands and Paris ranging from the 1950s to the 2010s.
Vandenhove died of pneumonia in Liège on 22 January 2019, aged 91.
